snippet.title: Heroes Ravage Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
We are proud to reveal our upcoming project for PC, Heroes Ravage!

Download now at: https://pixeldinos.itch.io/heroes-ravage

Heroes Ravage is an action game about heroes with no remorse and villagers desperately trying to protect their valuables.

If you would like to know more you can follow us on:

Discord: https://discord.gg/WRVg5bF
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PixelDinos
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/heroesravage
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/HeroesRavage/

You can also check our development blog where we post weekly updates at :
https://heroesravage.com/blog/
